casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Matthew LOWE. No. 278P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 11, 2015. Charlene Richardson, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Lowe, David Matthew. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of August 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of August 2015."
